author: Glow Edgeband
description: Glow Edgeband is a trusted PVC edgeband manufacturer and exporter offering edge solutions like PVC lipping and edge lipping for the global furniture industry.

content.title: Products Overview
content.summary: Explore our complete range of PVC edgebands, also known as PVC lipping or edge lipping, designed for durability, flexibility, and excellent bonding in furniture manufacturing.

content.title: High Gloss Edge Bands
content.summary: Exporter of high-gloss PVC edgebands with a smooth, reflective finish — perfect for modern furniture and interior designs.

content.title: Wood Grain Edge Bands
content.summary: Wood-like PVC edge lippings that replicate realistic wood textures, suitable for natural and premium aesthetics.

content.title: Solid Color Edge Bands
content.summary: Solid color PVC lipping available in a wide spectrum — ideal for both vibrant and minimal interior themes.

content.title: Fabric Textured Edge Bands
content.summary: Specialty fabric-textured PVC edge bands offering a tactile finish with a designer look for cabinets and panels.

content.title: Quality Check Process
content.summary: A deep look into our multi-stage quality assurance system to ensure export-grade PVC edgeband consistency and durability.
